instructions: # Character Sheet Inspired by the Saga Edition sheet by Mad Irishman Productions. This sheet auto-calculates Defences and Skills using the rules as written. Not all supplement rules may have been taken into account. If this is the case, please contact the authors.  **Last Updated** 8 January, 2019 View the Wiki for the Change Log and more information on the sheet including complete list of attributes and rolls: https://wiki.roll20.net/Star_Wars_Saga_Edition_Character_Sheet
